bb.desc: 16 combo powerful Dark attack on all foes, probable huge 1 turn Atk, Def reduction, hugely boosts Atk for 3 turns, hugely boosts Atk relative to Def for 3 turns & enormously boosts Spark damage for 3 turns
bb.name: La Veda: Malice

dictionary.description: A master of all manner of sinister techniques, Neviro even taught his advanced pupils assassination techniques. Had Neviro won in the sacred La Vedan tournament and made his school of fencing the national standard, it would have meant the spread of assassination techniques across the La Veda Republic. Given that Neviro's sect of fencers were likely involved in political infighting, this would have produced a very different history than that of modern La Veda fencing. Indeed, with Neviro acting as an advisor to the La Vedan elite, the republic doubtless would have entered a dark period in its history.
dictionary.evolution: In battle, victory is justice. When you lose, you die, and that's the end. Honorable and righteous? Don't bore me with that!
dictionary.fusion: Battle is always cruel. That is why I must win. Whenever, and against whomever.
dictionary.summon: Whatever means I must use, they're justified if I win. They just didn't understand that.
